title: Kai Dahlia, Ultimate Idol

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Perform a concert at a player's house, causing all players visiting your target and your target to become a Fan.
If all players are fans, you may choose to investigate a player: You learn their role.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: Fans who visit you will no longer have their visit affect you in any way, unless they have a protective ability that is actively targetting you.

desc:
Post 3605
*" I miss my sister.. at least I have you guys, right? "*
